column1: Figure 5: Younger people were more likely to have taken a drug in the last year than older people
Proportion of people who reported using a drug in the last year by age, England and Wales, year ending (YE) December 1997 to YE March 2024

column2: 1.    Data for 1997 and 1999 are for YE December. All other years are for YE March.
